tool_description: This is an API for people who can afford it.
name: I am rich
title: I am rich

api_list.name: Your name
api_list.description: Show to the world who is rich
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://i-am-rich3.p.rapidapi.com/Peter"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "i-am-rich3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://i-am-rich3.p.rapidapi.com/{yourname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "i-am-rich3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
